conversion_verification.notes: Walls have clear height and thickness, interior volume is visible, and the view is angled. The roof is removed.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: All fundamental aspects of 3D conversion are well-executed. Clean geometry and cutaway.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Room configuration and wall geometry are largely accurate. Some minor discrepancies in door/window placement or type.

interior_elements.notes: Most major furniture items are included and appropriately scaled, though some are missing (e.g., bathroom fixtures, certain closets).

visual_clarity.notes: Excellent visual clarity, legible geometry, and consistent aesthetic. No rendering artifacts or distracting elements.

detected_errors.description: Missing a closet door near the entrance. Bathroom fixtures (toilet, tub) are missing. Some windows appear where none are explicitly shown or are missing where shown.
No text labels or UI elements are present in the 3D render.

summary: The 2D floor plan has been transformed into a geometrically accurate and well-rendered 3D isometric cutaway model, with only minor omissions in interior details and some opening discrepancies.
